results.title: Activation of AMP-activated protein kinase inhibits ER stress and renal fibrosis.
results.text_hl: Activation of AMPK also suppressed ER stress by transforming growth factor-beta, @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@ANG II@@@, @CHEMICAL_Aldosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000450 @@@aldosterone@@@, and high @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@. Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced @GENE_HSPA5 @GENE_14828 @@@GRP78@@@ expression and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Ureteral_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014517 @@@unilateral ureteral obstruction@@@.
